import { MdOutlineFitScreen, MdShoppingBag,MdAddCircleOutline } from "react-icons/md" import { HiOutlineMinusCircle } from "react-icons/hi" import {useSelector,useDispatch} from "react-redux" import { decrement, increment } from "../../redux/cartSlice" import "./shop.css" import { useState } from "react" const Shop = () => { const [state , setState]=useState(false) const openShopcart =()=>{ if(state==false){ document.querySelector(".shop__cart").classList.add("shop__cart-open") setState(true) } if(state==true){ document.querySelector(".shop__cart").classList.remove("shop__cart-open") setState(false) } } return (
